pages.title: Jungle Planks!
pages.text: Gathering $(#FFA500)Jungle Planks $()is simple! This is the 4th capability that you will unlock! $(br2)Item Given: Jungle Planks

pages.name: Capability Level 300
pages.text: At $(#FFA500)level 300$(), you will be able to immediately gather $(#FFA500)Jungle Planks$()
